name: The Mayor has been Murdered
description:
Indie gaming's newest and worst murder mystery yet.  Full of exhilarating characters and deep storytelling!

Note: The HTML5 version is playable, but not ideal. Things like the pause menu which uses esc don't work. I added tab as an alias for the pause menu, but other than that most of the issues still remain

Features:

-Interrogate 4 characters with like 5 lines of dialogue each
-Amazing inventory mechanics that are used like twice
-Cut features that are never making it into the final release
-avant garde art style
-Bugs and glitches, including a way to clip out of bounds (devroom not in this version)
-A linux version, as well as a windows version I haven't tested yet
-So much unused content taking up file space!
-A title screen that took up most of the development time
